entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
